author: wtopstaff
title: Avalanche-Kings Sums
text:
0—2 
First Period_1, Los Angeles, Gaborik 1 (Brown, McNabb), 13:38. Penalties_Brown, LA (slashing), 5:01. 
Second Period_2, Colorado, Duchene 1 (Soderberg, Iginla), 15:57 (pp). 3, Los Angeles, Toffoli 3, 16:20. Penalties_Skille, Col, major (fighting), 2:44; McLeod, Col, major-game misconduct (fighting), 2:44; Nolan, LA, major (fighting), 2:44; Andreoff, LA, major-game misconduct (fighting), 2:44; Mitchell, Col (cross-checking), 3:22; Toffoli, LA (hooking), 9:25; Lucic, LA (tripping), 14:44. 
Third Period_None. Penalties_Zadorov, Col (holding), 4:38; Duchene, Col (interference), 7:26; Shore, LA (hooking), 10:05; Doughty, LA (cross-checking), 11:17; Landeskog, Col (hooking), 12:07; Shore, LA (interference), 14:40. 
Shots on Goal_Colorado 10-7-6_23. Los Angeles 14-12-14_40. 
Power-play opportunities_Colorado 1 of 6; Los Angeles 0 of 4. 
Goalies_Colorado, Berra 1-1-0 (40 shots-38 saves). Los Angeles, Quick 2-3-0 (23-22). 
A_18,230 (18,230). T_2:34. 
Referees_Tim Peel, Kyle Rehman. Linesmen_Ryan Galloway, Ryan Gibbons. Topics:
